name: Certified Organic Sho-Chiku-Bai®
description: Certified Organic Sho-Chiku-Bai® is a japanese style, short grain "sweet" or "mochi" rice is super starchy with specialized applications and not typically used as table or sushi rice. Grains are short, plump, and opaque and steam up in a sticky mass. Friction milled white. Less than 2% broken kernels.* Certified Organic (CCOF - California Certified Organic Farmers), certified Kosher (KSA), GMO-free (Non-GMO Project Verified), Gluten free. Pure, unadulterated rice— no additives of any sort.
